metrics.name: SOL-1682 Average time PGI to Invoice Creation
metrics.description: Average time from the posting of goods issue to the creation of an invoice item
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
        (SELECT LAST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN ('Create Invoice'))
        -
        (SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN ('Record Goods Issue'))
)

metrics.name: SOL-1682 Overdue and open Accounts Receivables
metrics.description: Number of overdue AND open yet not cleared invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
        WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL 
            AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
        )

metrics.name: SOL-1682 Total overdue invoice amounts
metrics.description: Sum of all invoice amounts that are overdue (converted in USD)
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER 
	(WHERE (SELECT COUNT (event_name)
    	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > "Last Inv. Item Due Date")) > 0
        )

metrics.name: SOL-1682 Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice was cleared after its due date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
        WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
                        WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > "Last Inv. Item Due Date")) > 0
        )
/ COUNT (case_id) * 100

metrics.name: SOL-1709 Late Payment Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared more than 1 day after the due date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '1days')
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
	)
* 100

metrics.name: SOL-1682 Dunning rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice is dunned

metricsVariables.name: dunning_condition
metricsVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has already been dunned, for example "InvoiceLastDunnedOn" IS NOT NULL
metricsVariables.value: "Last Inv. Item Dunned On" IS NOT NULL

metricsVariables.name: shipping_events
metricsVariables.description: Events identifying that the goods have been shipped, for example 'Post Goods Issue'

metricsVariables.name: billing_creation_events
metricsVariables.description: Events identifying the creation of invoice items, for example 'Create Invoice Item'

metricsVariables.name: invoice_overdue_condition
metricsVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice was cleared after the due date, for example "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"
metricsVariables.value: "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

metricsVariables.name: open_accounts_receivable_condition
metricsVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has not been cleared so far, although it was expected to. For example: NOW() > "InvoiceDueDate"
metricsVariables.value: "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL

children.name: Avg Time PGI to Invoice Creation
